edu.odu.cs.cs350.blue4

Class PageArchive

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.odu.cs.cs350.blue4.PageArchive

  • public class PageArchive
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the collection of all pages. All pages will be added in this class by user defined array This class will also give the output in Json and text file
    Author:
    asimamjad

      void updatePageReferences(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String other)
      This function update the references and first finds the page existence If a page does not exists, it will adds the page using addToReferenceBy function
